transcript:
Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello
Customer: Hello India Mart se bol rahe ho na aap?
Executive: Kahan se baat kar rahe hain mam?
Customer: Main Navneet product se bol rahi hun.
Executive: Achcha koi baat nahi yahan aapka ek feedback bhi aaya hai mere paas main aapko call back kar rahi hun aap mera call pick kar lijiye mam.
Customer: Ha okay.
Executive: Ye aapne apne family number se hi call kiya hai 114 jisme last mein.
Customer: Ha wohi number hai.
Executive: Thik hai aap receive kijiye mera phone.
Customer: Ha okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer inquired if the call was from India Mart.



Resolution:

- Executive stated they were calling back regarding feedback and asked the customer to pick up the call.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved. Executive asked the customer to receive their call.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

call, feedback
